dcterms:description: A dataset containing single-chain coarse-grained polymers used for simulating molecular dynamics, focusing on the structural and dynamical properties of polymers.

dcterms:description: A dataset of Li-ion polymer electrolytes used for simulating molecular dynamics, focusing on the ion transport properties and the dynamics of multi-component systems.
dcterms:title: Li-ion polymer electrolytes
